mapper.select: select hno, mno, DATE_FORMAT(reg_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_at, correct, goal, challenge from history where mno = #{mno} and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(reg_at, '%Y-%m-%d')
select hno, mno, DATE_FORMAT(reg_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_at, correct, goal, challenge from history where mno = #{mno} and DATE_FORMAT(reg_at, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{regAt}
select hno, DATE_FORMAT(reg_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, challenge, correct, goal from history where mno = #{mno} and DATE_FORMAT(reg_at, '%Y-%m') = #{date}
mapper.update: update history set challenge = #{challenge}, correct = #{correct} where hno = #{hno}
